web_snippets: Griffin Barber is a retired police officer, science fiction and fantasy author, and Editor for Baen Books. He also hosts and produced The Baen Free Radio Hour.
Griffin Barber, Editor, Baen Books Producer, Baen Free Radio Hour P.S. Happy New Year! minbyeonggug79 and 238 others.
Griffin Barber sat down with Baen Books publisher Toni Weisskopf to talk about the life and legacy of sword and sorcery author Howard Andrew Jones.
